title: romero121
author: romero121
content: Came across this image surfing Instagram and it is the truth happening with cryptocurrency and the leading fiat currencies. The market of USD, Euro were high compared to the market of Bitcoin, but the adoption and usage keeps rising with time. This image can be understood in different ways.Post similar images found across the internet.

comments.author: tjtonmoy
comments.created_time: October 01, 2022, 09:01:51 AMLast edit: October 01, 2022, 09:29:25 AM by tjtonmoy
comments.body: I used to make memes to promote many projects. I was left out with these templates, so thought I should make some now. Here's my attempt to make a funny pic according to the post. Correct me if i'm wrong in anywhere. i will be active to see what other people do as well.

comments.author: Frankolala
comments.body: The picture really shows that bitcoin is leading in the crypto world which we all know that,no matter how long the bear market last, bitcoin will hit the bull market soon. If not bitcoin no any other coin,as the rest coin are shit coins. Bitcoin users are increasing everyday by day.

comments.author: lovesmayfamilis
comments.body: Quote from: romero121 on October 01, 2022, 07:45:21 AMPost similar images found across the internet.OP, there are two good threads where your post would be appropriate.https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5232907.0https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=178336.0Otherwise, you don't have to be a fortuneteller to predict the future of this topic - a mega stream.

comments.body: The bitcoin community have always made epic memes. I much prefer the vibe & energy when we're in a bull market though.If you search bitcoin on Twitter youâ€™ll see loads. One of the best meme type content makers is https://twitter.com/naiivememe

comments.body: There's been a lot of epic memes over the years but for some reason older Bitcointalk images are proxied and not visible.
